name: CVE-2022-24527 Microsoft Connected Cache LPE
description: Detects files created during the local privilege exploitation of CVE-2022-24527 Microsoft Connected Cache
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:*WindowsPowerShell\\Modules\\webAdministration\\webAdministration.psm1 AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.User:(*AUTHORI* OR *AUTORI*))))`
